name: Rushikesh Sabale
position: Product @Haber | IITKgp | SAAS| FinTech | Blockchain | Product Lifecycle Management (PLM)| Agile Methodologies | Driving Growth and User-Centric Solutions
about: Passionate Product Manager with a love for innovation and a knack for transforming ideas into impactful solutions. Energized by the intersection of technology and creativity, I thrive in dynamic environments where I can lead and inspire teams to deliver exceptional products. Outside of work, I enjoy expressing myself through connecting with others. Let's collaborate and bring ideas to life!

current_company.name: Haber
current_company.title: Product @Haber | IITKgp | SAAS| FinTech | Blockchain | Product Lifecycle Management (PLM)| Agile Methodologies | Driving Growth and User-Centric Solutions

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Real Estate Tokenization-Spearheaded the ideation and conceptualization of a blockchain-based real estate tokenization project with the Haryana Government on the Polygon network.Led high-level meetings with key stakeholders, including an IAS officer, contributing to successful platform and mobile application design and demonstrations leading to a proposed grant of 13000 Acre for implementation.Customer Support Team-Empowered support staff for conducting debugging via KT sessions and documentation.Successfully achieved a 25% weekly reduction in customer tickets through strategic training, streamlined processes, and collaborative efforts with the tech team.Density Academy-Orchestrated the launch of Density Academy, a comprehensive trader-focused program integrating education, community building, funded wallets, and mentorship to support traders at every stage of their journey increasing monthly trading volume by 240%.Executed a successful pilot program and subsequently oversaw the initiation of regular monthly batches, achieving an average batch size of 250 students per cohort.Cricket Fantasy Application-Conceptualized and managed a blockchain-based cricket fantasy app from ideation to alpha release on the Polygon blockchain.Successfully co-executed a hackathon at IIT Kharagpur, recruited and managed a team of 10 interns for the project.
experience.description_html: Real Estate Tokenization-Spearheaded the ideation and conceptualization of a blockchain-based real estate tokenization project with the Haryana Government on the Polygon network.Led high-level meetings with key stakeholders, including an IAS officer, contributing to successful platform and mobile application design and demonstrations leading to a proposed grant of 13000 Acre for implementation.Customer Support Team-Empowered support staff for conducting debugging via KT sessions and documentation.Successfully achieved a 25% weekly reduction in customer tickets through strategic training, streamlined processes, and collaborative efforts with the tech team.Density Academy-Orchestrated the launch of Density Academy, a comprehensive trader-focused program integrating education, community building, funded wallets, and mentorship to support traders at every stage of their journey increasing monthly trading volume by 240%.Executed a successful pilot program and subsequently oversaw the initiation of regular monthly batches, achieving an average batch size of 250 students per cohort.Cricket Fantasy Application-Conceptualized and managed a blockchain-based cricket fantasy app from ideation to alpha release on the Polygon blockchain.Successfully co-executed a hackathon at IIT Kharagpur, recruited and managed a team of 10 interns for the project.

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Conducted thorough analysis of data flow within the loan management system (Finnone) at ICICI Bank, subsequently resolving high-value tickets through root cause analysis and documented findings to improve system functionality.Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address identified bugs and enhance user experience, demonstrating proficiency in problem-solving and documentation skills to ensure seamless operations within the loan management system.
